validator.description: Registers the concrete Validator implementation, carstore.FormatValidator with the validator identifier, FormatValidator.

attribute.description: List of format patterns separated by '|'. The validator compares these patterns against the data entered in a component that has this validator registered on it.

converter.description: Registers the concrete Converter implementation, carstore.CreditCardConverter using the ID, creditCardConverter.

managed-bean.description: Causes the default VariableResolver implementation to instantiate the managed bean, NA of the class, components.model.ImageArea in application scope if the bean does not already exist in any scope and initialize the shape, alt, and coords properties with the values specified by the managed-property elements.

managed-property.description: Initializes the shape property of the managed bean, NA with the value, poly.
Initializes the alt property of the managed bean, NA with the value, NAmerica.
Initializes the coords property of the managed bean, NA with the value specified by the value element.

navigation-case.description: Any action on chooseLocale should cause navigation to storeFront.jsp
Any action that returns "carDetail" on storeFront.jsp should cause navigation to carDetail.jsp
Any action that returns "confirmChoices" on carDetail.jsp should cause navigation to confirmChoices.jsp
Any action that returns "carDetail" on confirmChoices.jsp should cause navigation to carDetail.jsp
Any action that returns "customerInfo" on confirmChoices.jsp should cause navigation to customerInfo.jsp
Any action that returns "finish" on customerInfo.jsp should cause navigation to finish.jsp
